task.title: Highlighting Text for Analysis
task.shortdesc: Select a phrase to analyze its pronunciation.

prereq.p: The slice must have transcribed text.

step.cmd: Select text in the slice by clicking and dragging.

stepresult.p: A highlighter icon appears near your selection.

step.cmd: Click the icon to create a highlight.

stepresult.p: The text is highlighted and the Highlight Editor opens below.
As you can see from the image below, the text is highlighted in blue.

result.p: The highlight is created and you can now request AI analysis.
